gcci.text: With H100s now averaging $3.30/hr, hyperscalers are re-energizing capex plans while US-East availability stabilizes.

gtpi.text: As DeepSeek's token price averages $1.28/1M, API price compression is reshaping model competition.

gagl.text: With AI now drawing ~120 TWh annually, grid strain is accelerating nuclear baseload discussions.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment shows cautious optimism as consolidation and pricing normalization temper bubble concerns.
